org.corfudb.universe.node.client

Interface CorfuClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Node
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalCorfuClient

    public interface CorfuClient
extends Node
    Represent a Corfu client implementation of Node.

      • systemDownHandler

        default void systemDownHandler()
        A handler which is invoked at any point when the Corfu client attempts to make an RPC request to the Corfu cluster but is unable to complete. This method can be helpful in tests where the it is needed to assert that the cluster is unavailable

        void shutdown()
